page.title: 10Great event in Pennington
page.content: On the 24th May,1985 the Queen came to open Furness General Hospital.As well as going to open the hospital she came to visit Ulverstons'Cumbria Crystal factory and Urswick Grammar School.To reach Urswick she passed near Pennington and I went to see her.Before she appeared the police cleared the street and then some policemen on motorbikes went past and two police vans.Then a car with Ladies-in-waiting in went past.Finally the Queens7 car came.I saw the Queen.The Queen was in green.She was wearing a mint hat with a net on and a mint jacket and scirt and gloves.After she had driven past a lot of other cars with important people in went past.Later all the ordinary cars started to drive on the road again.
